solution_line_template: {initial_students}+{new_interested_students}=<<{initial_students}+{new_interested_students}={students_after_initial_interest}>>{students_after_initial_interest} students are enrolled in the German class.

{new_interested_students}*{dropout_fraction_new_recruits}=<<{new_interested_students}*{dropout_fraction_new_recruits}={new_recruits_dropped_out}>>{new_recruits_dropped_out} dropped out from the new recruits.

{frustrated_students_left} more left, so the class had {students_after_initial_interest}-{new_recruits_dropped_out}-{frustrated_students_left}=<<{students_after_initial_interest}-{new_recruits_dropped_out}-{frustrated_students_left}={students_after_initial_dropouts}>>{students_after_initial_dropouts} students left.

There were {students_after_initial_dropouts}*{enrollment_increase_factor}+{students_after_initial_dropouts}=<<{students_after_initial_dropouts}*{enrollment_increase_factor}+{students_after_initial_dropouts}={students_after_rally_increase}>>{students_after_rally_increase} total students in the class after the rally.

Two people had to drop the class, so there were {students_after_rally_increase}-{scheduling_conflict_dropouts}=<<{students_after_rally_increase}-{scheduling_conflict_dropouts}={students_after_scheduling_dropouts}>>{students_after_scheduling_dropouts} left.

{students_after_scheduling_dropouts}+{final_rally_enrollment}=<<{students_after_scheduling_dropouts}+{final_rally_enrollment}={students_after_final_rally}>>{students_after_final_rally} were enrolled after the final rally.
{students_after_final_rally}/{class_drop_divisor}=<<{students_after_final_rally}/{class_drop_divisor}={students_after_class_drop}>>{students_after_class_drop} are left after half the class dropped.
{students_after_class_drop}/{graduated_divisor}=<<{students_after_class_drop}/{graduated_divisor}={students_remaining}>>{students_remaining} are left after half the class graduated.
